localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
blogPost.body: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
blogPost.title: PalPark - Curate and share your learnings by topics
blogPost.author: Yixin Kou

localize.description: 如果你喜欢主题式学习，这就是你的选择! 用策展和创作来组织你的学习之旅。分享知识集锦，与同行共同受益和讨论。围绕你的学习组合建立你的个人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主题策划和分享您的学习成果

localize.description: 如果你喜歡主題式學習，這就是你的選擇! 用策展和創作來組織你的學習之旅。分享知識集錦，與同行共同受益和討論。圍繞你的學習組合建立你的個人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主題策劃和分享您的學習成果

previous.excerpt: The Intricately Assistant sits alongside the Google Chrome browser, automatically displaying real-time cloud data on prospects you and your team research. See your prospects’ cloud footprints, in our most actionable delivery platform yet.
previous.title: The Intricately Assistant - A new chrome extension to accelerate your sales prospecting

localize.description: Intricately Assistant与谷歌Chrome浏览器并驾齐驱，自动显示你和你的团队研究的潜在客户的实时云数据。在我们迄今为止最具可操作性的交付平台上，查看您的潜在客户的云足迹。
localize.tagline: 一个新的chrome扩展，以加快您的销售前景。

localize.description: Intricately Assistant與谷歌Chrome瀏覽器並駕齊驅，自動顯示你和你的團隊研究的潛在客戶的實時雲數據。在我們迄今爲止最具可操作性的交付平臺上，查看您的潛在客戶的雲足跡。
localize.tagline: 一個新的chrome擴展，以加快您的銷售前景。

next.excerpt: A free app that helps founders manage their investor courting process. If you know a founder raising capital or plan to do so yourself one day, this is a must. We are offering FounderZ created on our platform FREE to anyone starting a business this year.
next.title: FounderZ - Free app for founders to manage the fund raising process

localize.description: 一款帮助创始人管理投资人追求过程的免费应用。如果你认识一个创始人在筹集资金，或者计划有一天自己也要这样做，这是一个必须要做的事情。我们将向今年创业的人免费提供在我们平台上创建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 创始人管理筹资过程的免费应用。

localize.description: 一款幫助創始人管理投資人追求過程的免費應用。如果你認識一個創始人在籌集資金，或者計劃有一天自己也要這樣做，這是一個必須要做的事情。我們將向今年創業的人免費提供在我們平臺上創建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 創始人管理籌資過程的免費應用。
